Title: Beyond the stats: Eirini Kalliamvakou's take on the 2025 Octoverse report
Description:
Join Eirini Kalliamvakou, Research Advisor at GitHub, as she shares her expert insights on the findings from the Octoverse 2025 report. Hear her perspective on how the GitHub Copilot agent is affecting pull requests, the evolving sentiment towards AI, and the impact these tools are having on developer teams and onboarding.

Learn more: https://github.blog/news-insights/octoverse/the-new-identity-of-a-developer-what-changes-and-what-doesnt-in-the-ai-era/?utm\_source=youtube-octoverse-erini&utm\_medium=social&utm\_campaign=dec25postuniverse

Read the full Octoverse 2025 report: https://gh.io/octoverse

#Octoverse #SoftwareDevelopment #GitHub

— CHAPTERS —

00:00 - Introduction 00:08 - How the Copilot agent impacts pull requests 00:32 - How Copilot helps onboard new developers 01:23 - The evolution of AI sentiment among developers 02:01 - AI's effect on team dynamics and organizations 03:08 - Overall thoughts on the 2025 Octoverse report
